text: Korrawit Tasa (, born 7 April 2000) or simply known as Sun (), is a Thai professional footballerhttps://www.fourfourtwo.com/th/features/naakhtchaangsuek-5-ethphnyluukhnangaithyrwanecchiiyraainaipaihsud?page=0%2C2, who plays as a forward, he has also been used as a winger for Thai League 1 club Muangthong United. ==International career== In July 2015, he won the 2015 AFF U-16 Youth Championship with Thailand U16. ==International Goals== ===U19=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" !colspan="8"|Korrawit Tasa – goals for Thailand U19 |- ! # !!
